definition: can/to be able to/might possibly/ability/(physics) energy
tree trunk/main part of sth/to manage/to work/to do/capable/cadre/to kill (slang)/to fuck (vulgar)

sentences.english: Capable men produce the capable woman ideal.
sentences.chinese: 能干的男人造就能干的巾帼楷模。

sentences.english: Capable men produce the capable woman ideal.
sentences.chinese: 能干的男人造就能干的巾帼楷模。

sentences.english: He is a lewd of a dandy, but admits skill, shrewd.
sentences.chinese: 他固然是个好色的纨绔子弟，但身手矫捷，精明能干。

sentences.english: Weary and discouraged, I didn’t seem able to do anything right.
sentences.chinese: 我又疲倦又沮丧，似乎什么事情都没能干好。
宝莉是个能干的磋商者。

sentences.english: One good qualified man is better than a score of men.
sentences.chinese: 一个能干的人比得过一群无用的人。

sentences.english: You deserve to marry a capable and intelligent guy like me.
sentences.chinese: 你就该嫁给一个像我这样精明能干的人。

sentences.english: You make me complete. You make me forget who I am. You make me never afraid of living.
sentences.chinese: 实在是个可爱的能干的活力十足的话痨。

sentences.english: He really does own his wood, this able chap.
sentences.chinese: 他的林子确实是属于他的，这个能干的家伙。
我女儿非常聪明能干，但是嫁了个没头脑的女婿。

sentences.english: Doris has really got a good head on her shoulders.
sentences.chinese: 多利斯精明能干，我想她一定能做一名好经理。

sentences.english: The man it is rural registered permanent residence, single into the city, not wealthy but able set.
sentences.chinese: 男方当初是农村户口，单身进城开店，不富裕但能干。

sentences.english: I wanted to prove myself better than Firestone.
sentences.chinese: 我要证明自己比费尔斯通的人更能干。

sentences.english: Because of Jim's resourcefulness, we were able to complete the project on time.
sentences.chinese: 由于吉姆聪明能干，我们终于按时完成了任务。

sentences.english: I must allow that she is capable.

definition: variant of 賢慧|贤慧[xian2 hui4]
(said of sb else's wife) a good wife
fair and reasonable (idiom); sensible/standing to reason
